name: Docile Fright
description:
Playtime   40 minutes

       Rated         Ages 13+

       Controller Support (button mapping only available for keyboard)

In this game, the characters are held hostage by a hotel and must escape. Overcome the obstacles with solid positioning, skill choices, and level-ups. 

This demo is a side story of the main game.
